TopicTitle: RSS: KSC gone, camera stuck, textureless planet at start screen.

Articles.Content:
Hi there.

KSP: 1.0.4.861 Windows 32bit

Problem: KSC gone, camera stuck, textureless planet at start screen.

Mods installed:

ChuteSafetyIndicator 1.0.2

DMagicOrbitalScience 1.0.7

Hyperedit 1.4.1

Kopernicus 0.2.3

Module Manager 2.6.6

NearFutureSolar 0.5.3

RSS Planets & Moons expanded 0.7.0

TarsierSpaceTech (Continued) 5.4.1

Reproduction steps:

Start game -> Look at picture 1 -> Start new career / load career -> Look at picture 2.

Info:

After I uploaded the Kopernicus log I realised that im using the old version 0.2.3 instead of 0.2.4. So I downloaded the newest version but still the same problem.

I got the same issue if there are only Kopernicus, Module Manager and RSS Planets & Moons expanded installed. Tried it with a fresh installed KSP. If I delete the RSS folders (RealSolarSystem, RSS Planets & Moons mod and RSSTextures) everything is back to normal. 

Install direction: D:\...\...\...\Kerbal Space Program\GameData

Sorry I had to split the output\_log into 2 files because of pastebin limit. 

OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

CPU: Intel® Core i5-4690K CPU @ 3.50GHz (4)

RAM: 10190 MB

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT (temporary, GTX 970 is in RMA)

Log:

Kopernicus\_log [http://pastebin.com/GtCf1TCs](http://pastebin.com/GtCf1TCs)

output\_log [http://pastebin.com/GVaPHqH6](http://pastebin.com/GVaPHqH6)

output\_log2 [http://pastebin.com/ddJhU597](http://pastebin.com/ddJhU597)

Screenshots:

Picture 1 [http://i.imgur.com/bdyev4K.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/bdyev4K.jpg)

Picture 2 [http://i.imgur.com/2Gxa9Cc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2Gxa9Cc.jpg)

I hope I didnÃ‚Â´t miss everything. And thank you very much.

The problem with KSP is that you must READ/follow the mod recommendations to the **T**.. any deviation from that.. nutting works.

WELCOME TO KSP !!

You have a RSS non-friendly mix of mods..

Start here and read slowly....[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99966-0-25-0-Realism-Overhaul-6-1-2c](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99966-0-25-0-Realism-Overhaul-6-1-2c)

The funny thing is that with all the mods indicated.. Nathan has forgotten to include Realism Overhaul in the list, as this can be easily missed by the newbie

*Both* ***Real Solar System*** *and* ***Realism Overhaul*** *must be installed*

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T17:41:56Z" title="08/11/2015 05:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**

DidnÃ‚Â´t know that about Realism Overhaul. Maybe this could be added to the "very important.txt" file in RSS.

Right now IÃ‚Â´m downloading KSP again and will try it with those 4 mods. (Kopernicus, Module Manager, Realism Overhaul and RSS Planets & Moons)

I will edit this post if everythin is fine.

Edit: Problem solved. Can be closed. Thank you again ColKlonk.
